DeleteContainer.name: DeleteContainer
DeleteContainer.description: Grants permission to delete any container in the current account.

DeleteContainerPolicy.name: DeleteContainerPolicy
DeleteContainerPolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the access policy of any container in the current account.

DeleteCorsPolicy.name: DeleteCorsPolicy
DeleteCorsPolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the CORS policy from any container in the current account.

DeleteLifecyclePolicy.name: DeleteLifecyclePolicy
DeleteLifecyclePolicy.description:
Grants permission to delete the lifecycle policy from any container in the current
                                                account.

DeleteMetricPolicy.name: DeleteMetricPolicy
DeleteMetricPolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the metric policy from any container in the current account.

DescribeContainer.name: DescribeContainer
DescribeContainer.description: Grants permission to retrieve details on any container in the current account.

DescribeObject.name: DescribeObject
DescribeObject.description: Grants permission to retrieve object metadata.

GetContainerPolicy.name: GetContainerPolicy
GetContainerPolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve the access policy of any container in the current account.

GetCorsPolicy.name: GetCorsPolicy
GetCorsPolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve the CORS policy of any container in the current account.

GetLifecyclePolicy.name: GetLifecyclePolicy
GetLifecyclePolicy.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the lifecycle policy that is assigned to any container
                                                in the current account.

GetMetricPolicy.name: GetMetricPolicy
GetMetricPolicy.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the metric policy that is assigned to any container
                                                in the current account.

ListContainers.name: ListContainers
ListContainers.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of containers in the current account.

ListItems.name: ListItems
ListItems.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of objects and folders in the current account.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags on any container in the current account.

PutContainerPolicy.name: PutContainerPolicy
PutContainerPolicy.description:
Grants permission to create or replace the access policy of any container in the current
                                                account.

PutCorsPolicy.name: PutCorsPolicy
PutCorsPolicy.description:
Grants permission to add or modify the CORS policy of any container in the current
                                                account.

PutLifecyclePolicy.name: PutLifecyclePolicy
PutLifecyclePolicy.description:
Grants permission to add or modify the lifecycle policy that is assigned to any container
                                                in the current account.

PutMetricPolicy.name: PutMetricPolicy
PutMetricPolicy.description:
Grants permission to add or modify the metric policy that is assigned to any container
                                                in the current account.

StartAccessLogging.name: StartAccessLogging
StartAccessLogging.description: Grants permission to enable access logging on any container in the current account.

StopAccessLogging.name: StopAccessLogging
StopAccessLogging.description: Grants permission to disable access logging on any container in the current account.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add tags to any container in the current account.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from any container in the current account.
